subject: Throttle stopped working
description_text:
Hi

Do you know if you sell throttle pedal only because mines suddenly
stopped working, I don't want to buy the entire pedal again as I think
it's the wiring came loose from the throttle pedal. I don't know if my
pedals have warranty, but this is my order number. #SSN1707.

I'm using my clutch pedal as the throttle now,

Brian Chan

conversations.body_text: Hi UltraViewer10,  Please take a clear photo of the throttle pedal connector and send it to us for inspection. If the issue cannot be resolved after using the Offset function in the software, we will send you a replacement throttle pressure sensor for installation.

Hi UltraViewer10,     Please install the VAM Pro motor using nylon screws and nylon washers. This is intended to electrically isolate the VAM Pro motor from the mounting bracket, helping to prevent interference with the pedal signals.  Additionally, after the pedals are connected to the controller, you can click the Offset button in SIMSONN Manager to reset the initial position of the white signal to 0%, then recalibrate and test the pedals.

Hi

I've done the offset settings, and the throttle has 0 response no matter
how hard I press it
